query.value: InsightsMetrics | where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'coredns_dns_responses_total' | extend json = parse_json(Tags) | extend rcode = tostring(json.rcode) | extend podip = tostring(json.address) | extend podname = tostring(json.pod_name) | extend podnamespace = tostring(json.namespace) | sort by podname, rcode, TimeGenerated asc | extend preval =  iif(podnamespace == prev(podnamespace) and podname == prev(podname) and rcode == prev(rcode), prev(Val), real(null)) | where isnotnull(preval) | extend corednsrescount = Val - preval | extend servfailcount = iif(rcode == 'SERVFAIL', corednsrescount, real(0)) | summarize servfailcounttotal=sum(servfailcount), corednsrescounttotal=sum(corednsrescount) by Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, podnamespace | extend percentage = servfailcounttotal / corednsrescounttotal
